title: الْجُمَلُ الَّتِي لَا مَحَلَّ لَهَا مِنَ الإِعْرَابِ
description: Learn about the seven types of sentences that have no grammatical position (لا محل لها من الإعراب) in Arabic syntax, as identified by classical grammarians.

notes.title: Introduction
content: In Arabic grammar, sentences are classified into two types based on their إِعْراب: those that occupy a grammatical position (لها محلّ من الإعراب) and those that do not (لا محلّ لها من الإعراب).

Classical grammarians identified seven types of sentences that have no grammatical position. These sentences function independently or are structurally necessary but don't replace a single word's grammatical role.
keyPoints: Seven types of sentences without position
Don't replace a single word grammatically

examples.english: Zayd is standing (opening sentence)
The one who succeeded came (relative clause)
By Allah, I will surely do it (oath response)
He said - meaning spoke - the truth (parenthetical)

notes.title: The Opening Sentence
content: الْجُمْلَة الابْتِدَائِيَّة is the sentence that begins speech. It has no prior grammatical context to connect to, so it cannot have a grammatical position.
This includes the first sentence of any discourse, speech, or text. It stands independently as the foundation of what follows.
keyPoints: No prior context to connect to
الْحَمْدُ للهِ is an opening sentence

examples.english: Praise be to Allah, Lord of the worlds
In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
Peace be upon you
Knowledge is light

notes.title: The New Topic Sentence
content: الْجُمْلَة الاسْتِئْنَافِيَّة is a sentence that begins a new topic after the previous one has concluded. It's grammatically independent from what preceded it.
Even though it follows other sentences, it starts fresh without grammatical dependence on the previous context. Often introduced by وَ الاستئنافية.
keyPoints: Begins new topic after previous one ends

examples.english: So-and-so died. And he was a righteous man
Zayd left. And Amr is sick
I read the book. And it is beneficial
I finished the work. And praise be to Allah

notes.title: The Relative Clause
content: جُمْلَة صِلَة الْمَوْصُول is the clause that follows a relative pronoun (الَّذِي، الَّتِي، etc.) and defines it. It has no grammatical position of its own.
The relative clause is essential for completing the meaning of the relative pronoun, but grammatically it doesn't occupy a position like nominative or accusative.

examples.english: The one who succeeded came
I read what you wrote
I saw the student who won
This is the woman who helped me

notes.title: The Oath Response
content: جُمْلَة جَواب الْقَسَم is the sentence that follows an oath (وَاللهِ، تَاللهِ، etc.) and states what is being sworn about.
This sentence has no grammatical position because it's the semantic content of the oath, not a syntactic complement. It answers: 'What are you swearing about?'
keyPoints: Often has لَ or إِنَّ for emphasis

examples.english: By Allah, I will surely do good
By Allah, he has indeed spoken truth
By your life, he is truthful
By Allah upon you, go out

notes.title: Parenthetical and Explanatory Sentences
content: الْجُمْلَة الاعْتِرَاضِيَّة is inserted between two related elements for emphasis, prayer, or clarification. It interrupts the sentence without affecting its structure.
الْجُمْلَة التَّفْسِيرِيَّة explains what precedes it, often introduced by أَيْ or أَنْ التفسيرية. Both types have no grammatical position.

examples.english: Indeed Zayd - and Allah knows best - is successful
He was - may Allah have mercy on him - a scholar
I signaled to him, meaning: go
I wrote to him that (meaning): come

exercises.prompt: الْجُمَلُ الَّتِي لَا مَحَلَّ لَهَا مِنَ الإِعْرَابِ عَدَدُهَا _____ جُمَل
exercises.promptEn: Sentences without grammatical position number _____ types

exercises.prompt: الْجُمْلَةُ _____ هِيَ الَّتِي تَبْدَأُ بِهَا الْكَلَام
exercises.promptEn: The _____ sentence is one that begins speech

exercises.prompt: جُمْلَةُ صِلَةِ الْمَوْصُولِ تَأْتِي بَعْدَ الاسْمِ _____
exercises.promptEn: The relative clause comes after the _____ noun
The _____ response sentence has no grammatical position

exercises.prompt: الْجُمْلَةُ الاعْتِرَاضِيَّةُ تُدْخَلُ لِلتَّوْكِيدِ أَوِ _____ أَوِ التَّوْضِيحِ
exercises.promptEn: The parenthetical sentence is inserted for emphasis, _____, or clarification
The _____ sentence explains what precedes it

exercises.answer: New topic sentence (begins fresh after previous topic)
